docna.cdata!:
Guyana - Import Industries : Loan 1622 -
            Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Guyana - Import Industries : Loan
            1622 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

repnme.cdata!: Guyana - Program Loan and Credit Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The loan/credit would provide foreign
            exchange for imports into Guyana of raw materials and
            capital and intermediate goods. The loan/credit would
            support the economic program of the Government of Guyana
            which has been reviewed by the Bank and found appropriate.
            The Guyana dollar equivalent generated by imports financed
            under the loan/credit would be deposited in a special
            account held by the Ministry of Finance and used to meet
            local costs of development projects in the public sector
            investment program.
